name: OR_PNDS
description: This table contains OR management system Perioperative Nursing Data Set (PNDS) elements.

columns.description: The unique internal ID of the Perioperative Nursing Data Set (PNDS) element record.

columns.description: The name of the PNDS record.

columns.name: ELEMENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the PNDS record.
